original_text: But it does not matter to me! All of them are telling people about Christ. That is the most important thing. Whether they speak because of wrong reasons or because of right reasons, they are speaking the message about Christ! Because of that, I am happy.
korean_text: 그러면 무엇이냐 겉치레로 하나 참으로 하나 무슨 방도로 하든지 전파되는 것은 그리스도니 이로써 나는 기뻐하고 또한 기뻐하리라

sentences.original_text: But it does not matter to me!
All of them are telling people about Christ.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두 사람들에게 그리스도에 대해 말하고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: That is the most important thing.
Whether they speak because of wrong reasons
they are speaking the message about Christ!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그리스도에 대한 메시지를 말하고 있습니다!

sentences.original_text: Because of that, I am happy.
